original_text: And the men of Ephraim said unto him, Why hast thou served us thus, that thou calledst us not, when thou wentest to fight with the Midianites? And they did chide with him sharply.
korean_text: 에브라임 사람들이 기드온에게 이르되 네가 미디안과 싸우러 갈 때에 우리를 부르지 아니하였으니 우리를 이같이 대접함은 어찌 됨이냐 하고 그와 크게 다투는지라

sentences.original_text: And the men of Ephraim said unto him
Why hast thou served us thus
when thou wentest to fight with the Midianites
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 미디안 사람들과 싸우러 갔을 때

sentences.original_text: And they did chide with him sharply
